1529.13.text:
He was the 91st person
to prove up on his claim.

1533.53.text:
Now, I was ready
to find out more

1535.67.text:
about my family's photo
from historian John Carter

1538.73.text:
of the Nebraska State
Historical Society.

1542.53.text:
JOHN CARTER: So, let's go
take a look at it.

1545.40.text:
KATIE FARRITOR: John learned
of my family's unique story

1547.67.text:
from my distant
cousin, Chuck Farritor.

1550.37.text:
Chuck kept the story within
the family for many years,

1553.63.text:
but John convinced him
it was worth sharing.

1557.50.text:
CARTER: Butcher came out and
made this photograph,

1560.07.text:
and then for years
it was lost, damaged,

1566.10.text:
and the family had it
put back together again,

1568.60.text:
and it's been a family
heirloom ever since.

1571.47.text:
KATIE FARRITOR: As my distant
cousin Chuck told the story,

1574.07.text:
Solomon Butcher stayed
with my family for a week.

1578.87.text:
Butcher set up his camera
and took the photo.

1582.20.text:
Then, he presented my
great-great-grandfather
with a bill.

1588.87.text:
for all the food he had
supplied to Mr. Butcher

1594.17.text:
He tore up the
photograph, and left.

1597.37.text:
CARTER: When Butcher stomped
off, he also said,

1599.83.text: I'm going to break the negative,

1602.07.text:
relegate you to the
dustbin of history.

1606.80.text:
Now, what we
learned years later,

1608.93.text:
was that he clearly did
not break the negative.

1615.47.text:
ASSISTANT: Okay, so this is
the original negative

1617.60.text:
that Solomon Butcher would've
taken of your family.

1622.07.text:
When you hold it, hold
it by the long edge,

1629.50.text:
Why do you think
he didn't break it?

1632.97.text:
CARTER: Bottom line is, Butcher
was driven by his project.

1638.03.text: that he was going to use

1639.93.text:
to tell the narrative of
settlement on the Great Pains.

1647.43.text:
and you've got it in
your hands right now.

1652.17.text:
It's just really
interesting, I mean,

1654.47.text:
growing up in Broken Bow
and not knowing any of it,

1657.20.text:
and then now, you
know, being here,

1660.60.text:
and having a chance
to look at everything,

1663.83.text:
and find out way
more than I ever had

1687.63.text:
And go to Facebook to Like
us, and leave a comment.
